About Myself

Testimonials

Urmila Singhal Founder, OmSpark

Sneha has a great eye for design and her web development skills are great. She is a good communicator and can express herself well. Understanding the customer requirements and concerting those to a full blown website is something she brings to the table. It has been such a pleasure working alongside with Sneha at Om Spark.

Minal Patil Validation Engineer, Intel

Sneha worked with me over a year at Intel while she was interning in architecture team and then she was hired in my team as validation engineer. She is quick learner, great team player, and effective listener which makes her valuable asset to any team. Very calm and pleasant person (even in stressful critical debug times) who holds tremendous potential as an individual contributor.

Erin Carroll Engineering Manager, Intel

Sneha demonstrated an ability to work well independently or on a team, and has a strong focus on quality and results. She is very flexible, and able to adapt to changes in direction quickly. As a team member, Sneha is great to work with, always willing to help and a very pleasant person to be around and have on a team. I think Sneha has a lot of potential as an engineer, and I am happy to personally recommend her as a strong individual contributor.
